name: RubberBoy
description: You play as RubberBoy, a magical eraser formed from a spilled orange juice accident.  You want to escape the EraserCorp factory you were made from and want to go home! But the Boss will make sure you will never be able to leave, and is always chasing behind you. Will you be able to make it through all of the three floors of the EraserCorp factory? Find out in this procedurally-generated autorunner game!
